alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 8:48AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Houston and eastern Madison Counties through 945 AM CST... At 848 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Crockett to 6 miles south of Austonio to near Madisonville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crockett, Lovelady and Kennard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
